text: Post Box No. 27 is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Anil , starring Mukesh and Siddique in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Mukesh * Sainudeen * Siddique * Rudra * Jagathy Sreekumar * Innocent * Kalpana * Jagadish * Mamukkoya * Suma Jayaram * Thodupuzha Vasanthy * Bindu Ramakrishnan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Post Box No. 27
